name: NARX simulator with neural networks
short_description:
This projects aims at creating a simulator for the NARX (Nonlinear AutoRegressive with eXogenous inputs ) architecture with neural networks. The system can fallback to MLP ( multi layer perceptron ), TDNN ( time delay neural network ), BPTT ( backpropagation through time ) and a full NARX architecture.
The system is intended to be used as a time series forecaster for educational purposes. 
This projects is my personal master thesis developed at the Master of Artificial Intelligence at Universitat Polytecnica de Catalunya, Barcelona
The project presents artificial generated data but also real data tests from temperature, weather, economy.
Please refer to the documentation for test results.
If you want to improve or be part of this project, please send me a message.
summary: A simulator for NARX ( Nonlinear AutoRegressive with eXogenous inputs)
